content:
Hi FHIR community. Hoping to get some guidance...

When converting a c-cda to fhir, what resource/profile should be used to capture entries in the Interventions section? Thanks!
Have you looked at the C-CDA-on-FHIR IG? https://build.fhir.org/ig/HL7/ccda-on-fhir-r4
Also, you might want to follow #cda to fhir

Thanks Lloyd, I will check out this chat.

I did look at the IG. Specifically, looking here: https://build.fhir.org/ig/HL7/ccda-on-fhir-r4/StructureDefinition-Continuity-of-Care-Document.html
I do not see any mention of Interventions...

When it comes to implementation guides, the CI build is not always the latest. The officially published IG is at http://hl7.org/fhir/us/ccda/index.html, but I am not sure that it will help with the original question.
I'd raise the question on #cda to fhir
